description: Another ghost from http://anidb.net/ch5462 [Arashi]`s time and her best friend. She was an exchange student from Germany who studied at her school. Her polite and cool demeanor opposes to http://anidb.net/ch5462 [Arashi]`s lively and carefree personality. She posesses the same time traveling powers as her, but she can only make a connection with a living girl.
name: Kaya Bergmann
